step_data.thought: I have clicked on the 'Save Customer Group' button to finalize the updates. Now, I need to confirm that the changes have been saved successfully. The page should display a confirmation message indicating that the customer group has been saved. I will wait a moment to allow the page to update and then confirm if the message appears.
